title: Prerendering static pages
contents:
mode_edit

預先渲染靜態頁面link

Prerendering static pageslink

Angular Universal 允許你預先渲染應用程式的頁面。預先渲染是在建構時處理動態頁面產生靜態 HTML 的過程。

Angular Universal lets you prerender the pages of your application. Prerendering is the process where a dynamic page is processed at build time generating static HTML.

如何預先渲染頁面link

How to prerender a pagelink

要預先渲染靜態頁面，要先向你的應用程式新增伺服器端渲染（SSR）功能。有關更多資訊，請參閱 Universal 指南。新增 SSR 後，執行以下命令：

To prerender a static page make sure to add Server-Side Rendering (SSR) capabilities to your application. For more information see the universal guide. Once SSR is added, run the following command:

npm run prerender

預先渲染的建構選項link

Build options for prerenderinglink

嚮應用程式新增預先渲染時，可以使用以下建構選項：

When you add prerendering to your application, the following build options are available:

選項Options 詳情Details
browserTarget 指定要建構的目標。Specify the target to build.
serverTarget 指定用於預先渲染的應用程式的伺服器目標。Specify the Server target to use for prerendering the application.
routes 定義要預先渲染的額外路由陣列。Define an array of extra routes to prerender.
guessRoutes 建構器是否應該提取路由並猜測要渲染的路徑。預設為 true。Whether builder should extract routes and guess which paths to render. Defaults to true.
routesFile 指定一個檔案，其中包含要預先渲染的所有路由的列表，以換行符分隔。如果你有大量路由，則此選項很有用。Specify a file that contains a list of all routes to prerender, separated by newlines. This option is useful if you have a large number of routes.
numProcesses 指定在執行預先渲染命令時要使用的 CPU 數量。Specify the number of CPUs to be used while running the prerendering command.

預先渲染動態路由link

Prerendering dynamic routeslink

你還可以預先渲染動態路由。動態路由的一個例子是 product/:id，其中 id 是動態提供的。

You can prerender dynamic routes. An example of a dynamic route is product/:id, where id is dynamically provided.

要預先渲染動態路由，請從以下選項中選擇一個：

To prerender dynamic routes, choose one from the following options:

  • 在命令列中提供額外的路由

    Provide extra routes in the command line

  • 使用檔案來提供路由

    Provide routes using a file

  • 預先渲染指定路由

    Prerender specific routes

在命令列中提供額外的路由link

Provide extra routes in the command linelink

在執行 prerender 命令時，你可以提供額外的路由。比如：

While running the prerender command, you can provide extra routes. For example:

ng run <app-name>:prerender --routes /product/1 /product/2

使用檔案提供額外的路由link

Providing extra routes using a filelink

你可以使用檔案提供路由以建立靜態頁面。如果你要建立的大量路由（比如電子商務應用程式的產品詳細資訊）可能來自外部源，比如資料庫或內容管理系統（CMS），則此方法很有用。

You can provide routes using a file to create static pages. This method is useful if you have a large number of routes to create. For example, product details for an e-commerce application, which might come from an external source, like a Database or Content Management System (CMS).

要使用檔案來提供路由，請使用 --routes-file 選項和包含路由的 .txt 檔案的名稱。

To provide routes using a file, use the --routes-file option with the name of a .txt file containing the routes.

比如，你可以透過使用指令碼從資料庫中提取 ID 並將它們儲存到 routes.txt 檔案來建立此檔案：

For example, you could create this file by using a script to extract IDs from a database and save them to a routes.txt file:

/products/1 /products/555

當你的 .txt 檔案準備好後，執行以下命令以使用一些動態值來預先渲染靜態檔案：

When your .txt file is ready, run the following command to prerender the static files with dynamic values:

ng run <app-name>:prerender --routes-file routes.txt

預先渲染特定路由link

Prerendering specific routeslink

你還可以將特定路由傳遞給 prerender 命令。如果你選擇此選項，請確保關閉 guessRoutes 選項。

You can also pass specific routes to the prerender command. If you choose this option, make sure to turn off the guessRoutes option.

ng run <app-name>:prerender --no-guess-routes --routes /product/1 /product/2
最後複查時間：2/28/2022
